text: 7|189|Ore manitariliruntu unkalai pataittavan avantan; avarutan (cukamakak) kuti vacippatarkaka avarutaiya manaiviyai avarilirunte urpatti ceytan. Avalai avar (tan tekattaik kontu) mutik kontapotu aval ilecana karppamanal. Pinnar atai(c cumantu) kontu tirintal. Aval cumai paluvakave ‘‘enkal iraivane! Ni enkalukku nallatoru cantatiyai alittal niccayamaka nankal unakku nanri celuttik kontiruppom'' enru avviruvarum pirarttittuk kontiruntarkal
